title: The Pelican Brief (1993) Julia Roberts + Denzel Washington
description:
<a href="http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0107798/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0107798/</a>

One of the best conspiracy films ever made, based on John Grisham's novel. It looks as if only full DVDs remain here at PirateBay, so I post this for people who want a smaller version. It is not my rip, I found it on the net using Piratebay's tracker, so I thought it should be represented here.

Low widescreen, very good stereo, some grain in the picture. The film is 2 hrs 20 minutes long, so you'll have to download a bigger file if you want better quality.

Burn tested, runs well in my DivX player.
